title: How to unsubscribe from PromptSmart
description: To cancel your PromptSmart subscription, you'll need to manage it through your Google Play account, as PromptSmart cannot directly cancel it for you. Here's how:

steps_1.title: Unsubscribe via Google Play Store (Android)
steps_1.description:
To cancel your PromptSmart subscription on an Android device:

*   Open the Google Play Store app on your Android device.
*   Tap on your profile icon in the top right corner.
*   Go to 'Payments & subscriptions'.
*   Select 'Subscriptions'.
*   Find and select 'PromptSmart' from the list of your subscriptions.
*   Tap 'Cancel subscription'.
*   Follow the on-screen instructions to confirm the cancellation. Your subscription will be terminated at the end of the current billing cycle.

seo_text: Cancel PromptSmart subscription on Android. Manage PromptSmart billing through Google Play. Stop PromptSmart auto-renewal. End PromptSmart subscription.
